english.segment1: Bite the hand. The hand that feeds you, needs you. Greeds you, bleeds you. Grieves you, leaves you. Greets you, eats you. Bite the
english.segment2: They want what's best for you. They would never hurt you. You could never understand. In ignorance you bite the hand
english.segment3: Hand that supplies you, denies you. Relieves you, deceives you. Excites you, unites you. Violates you, sedates you. Bite the.
